articles.author: Rory Smith
articles.title: Lionel Messi Wins Record Seventh Ballon d’Or - The New York Times
articles.description: The Paris St.-Germain star capped a year in which he led Argentina to the Copa América title by edging Bayern Munich’s Robert Lewandowski.
articles.content: Messi finished with 613 points in the voting, only 33 more than the runner-up, Bayern Munich striker Robert Lewandowski. In 2019, the last time the trophy was awarded, Messi beat Liverpools Virgil va… [+1235 chars]
